title: Emerald Kundan Jhumka - A Timeless Adornment
materials: Faceted Emeralds. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: Classic bell-shaped jhumka design with intricate floral filigree work. The top features a stylized flower with a pear-shaped emerald surrounded by shimmering Kundan stones. The jhumka is adorned with dangling golden ghungroos (small beads) that create a melodious chime.
colors: deep green from the emerald and the brilliance of the Kundan stones (white).
occasions: and other traditional South Indian celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits for special events.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship from skilled artisans. The timeless design embodies South Indian heritage and elegance. Emeralds are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. High-quality Kundan stones provide unparalleled brilliance, making it a valuable heirloom piece.
